name: Talk Brandt
_source: s;Brandt;Ah, the young Lord Verstadt.{w}{br}The last time I saw you, you were but a boy accompanying his father.
s;Brandt;General, now.{w}{br}But no need for such formalities on my behalf, milord.{w}{br}What brings you to Lord Morrissey's lands, especially now of all times?
s;Brandt;Surely not.{w}{br}Your father built House Verstadt into a pillar of stength.{w}{br}Bandits and mosnters alike feared the legacy he built.
s;Simon;I thought so too...{w}{br}But rebels overwhelmed us regardless.{w}{br}If not for Luther and Vincent, I'd probably be dead.
s;Brandt;This is certainly worrying.{w}{br}You'd best speak with Lord Morrissey.
s;Brandt;Bandits and monsters only respect strength, young Verstadt.{w}{br}This is a lesson your father learned early.{w}{br}I hope for your sake you learn it soon too.
